banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
descriptions: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.primary_description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Entity Public Float
descriptions: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.
EntityPublicFloat.primary_description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

labels: Derivative, Notional Amount
descriptions: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payment on derivative.
Aggregate notional amount specified by the derivative(s). Expressed as an absolute value.
DerivativeNotionalAmount.primary_description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payment on derivative.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
descriptions: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.primary_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.primary_description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Additional Paid in Capital
descriptions: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.
AdditionalPaidInCapital.primary_description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Amortization of Intangible Assets
descriptions: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.primary_description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Assets
descriptions: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
descriptions: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.primary_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.primary_description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
descriptions: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.primary_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.primary_description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost
descriptions: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.primary_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Available-for-sale Securities
descriptions: Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading.
AvailableForSaleSecurities.primary_description: Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading.

labels: Available-for-sale Securities, Amortized Cost Basis
descriptions: This item represents the cost of debt and equity securities, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading, net of adjustments including accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments recognized in earnings (less any cumulative-effect adjustments recognized, as defined), and fair value hedge accounting adjustments, if any.
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesAmortizedCost.primary_description: This item represents the cost of debt and equity securities, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading, net of adjustments including accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments recognized in earnings (less any cumulative-effect adjustments recognized, as defined), and fair value hedge accounting adjustments, if any.

labels: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than Twelve Months, Fair Value
descriptions: This item represents the aggregate fair value of investments in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities that have been in a continuous unrealized loss position for less than twelve months.
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.primary_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than Twelve Months, Fair Value
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.primary_description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of investments in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities that have been in a continuous unrealized loss position for less than twelve months.

labels: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Twelve Months or Longer, Fair Value
descriptions: This item represents the aggregate fair value of investments in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities that have been in a continuous unrealized loss position for twelve months or longer.
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.primary_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Twelve Months or Longer, Fair Value
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.primary_description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of investments in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities that have been in a continuous unrealized loss position for twelve months or longer.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
descriptions: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.primary_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
descriptions: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.primary_label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.primary_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Cash and Due from Banks
descriptions: For banks and other depository institutions: Includes cash on hand (currency and coin), cash items in process of collection, noninterest bearing deposits due from other financial institutions (including corporate credit unions), and noninterest bearing balances with the Federal Reserve Banks, Federal Home Loan Banks and central banks.
CashAndDueFromBanks.primary_description: For banks and other depository institutions: Includes cash on hand (currency and coin), cash items in process of collection, noninterest bearing deposits due from other financial institutions (including corporate credit unions), and noninterest bearing balances with the Federal Reserve Banks, Federal Home Loan Banks and central banks.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
descriptions: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.primary_label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.primary_description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
descriptions: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.primary_label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.primary_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

labels: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
descriptions: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.primary_label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.primary_description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
descriptions: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.primary_label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.primary_description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
descriptions: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.
CommonStockSharesAuthorized.primary_description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
descriptions: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.
CommonStockSharesIssued.primary_description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Common Stock, Value, Issued
descriptions: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.
CommonStockValue.primary_description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
descriptions: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.primary_label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.primary_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.primary_description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.primary_description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.primary_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for more than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. descriptions: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without allowance for credit loss. DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.primary_description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without allowance for credit loss. labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months
descriptions: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.primary_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.primary_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
descriptions: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.primary_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.primary_description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain
descriptions: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.primary_description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss
descriptions: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.primary_description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.primary_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position without allowance for credit loss.

labels: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)

DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.primary_description: Amount of deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

labels: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)

labels: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost

DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.primary_description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Deposits
descriptions: The aggregate of all deposit liabilities held by the entity, including foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing; may include demand deposits, saving deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits among others.
Deposits.primary_description: The aggregate of all deposit liabilities held by the entity, including foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing; may include demand deposits, saving deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits among others.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Derivative Asset
descriptions: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
DerivativeAssets.primary_description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.primary_label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.primary_description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Long-term Debt
descriptions: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.
LongTermDebt.primary_description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
descriptions: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.primary_label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.primary_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
descriptions: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.primary_label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.primary_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
descriptions: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.primary_label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.primary_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
descriptions: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.
NetIncomeLoss.primary_description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
descriptions: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.primary_label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.primary_description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Noninterest Expense
descriptions: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.
NoninterestExpense.primary_description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Noninterest Income
descriptions: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.
NoninterestIncome.primary_description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
descriptions: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.
NotesReceivableGross.primary_label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.primary_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Occupancy, Net
descriptions: Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.
OccupancyNet.primary_description: Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Lease, Cost
descriptions: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.
OperatingLeaseCost.primary_description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Lease, Liability
descriptions: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.
OperatingLeaseLiability.primary_description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
descriptions: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.primary_description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Other Assets
descriptions: Amount of assets classified as other.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
descriptions: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.primary_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.primary_description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, after Tax
descriptions: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.primary_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.primary_description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Other Liabilities
descriptions: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Other Noninterest Expense
descriptions: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.
OtherNoninterestExpense.primary_description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
descriptions: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.primary_label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.primary_description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
descriptions: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.primary_description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
descriptions: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.primary_label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.primary_description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
descriptions: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.primary_label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.primary_description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
descriptions: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.primary_description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
descriptions: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.
PreferredStockValue.primary_description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
descriptions: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.primary_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.primary_description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
descriptions: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.primary_label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.primary_description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
descriptions: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.primary_label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.primary_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
descriptions: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.primary_label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.primary_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
descriptions: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.primary_label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.primary_description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
descriptions: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
descriptions: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.primary_description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
descriptions: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.primary_label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.primary_description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
descriptions: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.primary_description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
descriptions: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.primary_label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.primary_description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
descriptions: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.primary_label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.primary_description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
descriptions: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.primary_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.primary_description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
descriptions: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.primary_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.primary_description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
descriptions: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.
StockholdersEquity.primary_description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
descriptions: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.primary_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.primary_description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Unrecognized Tax Benefits
descriptions: Amount of unrecognized tax benefits.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
descriptions: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.primary_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.primary_description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
descriptions: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.primary_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.primary_description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
descriptions: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.primary_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.primary_description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
descriptions: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.primary_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.primary_description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
descriptions: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.primary_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.primary_description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
descriptions: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.primary_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.primary_description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
descriptions: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.primary_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.primary_description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
descriptions: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.primary_label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.primary_description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Payments to Acquire Held-to-maturity Securities
descriptions: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.
PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.primary_description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Held-to-maturity Securities
descriptions: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.primary_label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.primary_description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Year One
descriptions: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.primary_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Year One
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.primary_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

labels: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
descriptions: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.primary_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity
descriptions: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).
HeldToMaturitySecurities.primary_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
descriptions: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.primary_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.primary_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
descriptions: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.primary_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.primary_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
descriptions: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.primary_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.primary_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
descriptions: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.primary_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.primary_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
descriptions: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.primary_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.primary_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
descriptions: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.primary_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.primary_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
descriptions: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.primary_label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.primary_description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
descriptions: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Net of Tax, for the period. Includes deferred gains or losses on qualifying hedges, unrealized holding gains or losses on available-for-sale securities, minimum pension liability, and cumulative translation adjustment. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.primary_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.primary_description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Net of Tax, for the period. Includes deferred gains or losses on qualifying hedges, unrealized holding gains or losses on available-for-sale securities, minimum pension liability, and cumulative translation adjustment. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

banks: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION
labels: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
descriptions: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.primary_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.primary_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

DerivativeNotionalAmount.label: Derivative, Notional Amount
DerivativeNotionalAmount.description: Aggregate notional amount specified by the derivative(s). Expressed as an absolute value.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AdditionalPaidInCapital.label: Additional Paid in Capital
AdditionalPaidInCapital.description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleSecurities.label: Available-for-sale Securities
AvailableForSaleSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesAmortizedCost.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Amortized Cost Basis
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesAmortizedCost.description: This item represents the cost of debt and equity securities, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading, net of adjustments including accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments recognized in earnings (less any cumulative-effect adjustments recognized, as defined), and fair value hedge accounting adjustments, if any.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than Twelve Months, Fair Value
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of investments in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities that have been in a continuous unrealized loss position for less than twelve months.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Twelve Months or Longer, Fair Value
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesContinuousUnre.description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of investments in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities that have been in a continuous unrealized loss position for twelve months or longer.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashAndDueFromBanks.label: Cash and Due from Banks
CashAndDueFromBanks.description: For banks and other depository institutions: Includes cash on hand (currency and coin), cash items in process of collection, noninterest bearing deposits due from other financial institutions (including corporate credit unions), and noninterest bearing balances with the Federal Reserve Banks, Federal Home Loan Banks and central banks.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

CommonStockSharesAuthorized.label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
CommonStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer
